topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.0: Terminating Instances

body.p: You can terminate an instance, as needed.

ol.li: Launch the HP Helion OpenStack Horizon Dashboard.
Select the appropriate region and project.

Based on whether you are working on a project or the domain:
Click the Admin dashboard, then the System panel, then the Instances tab.
Click the Project dashboard, then the Compute panel, then the Instances tab.

In the Instances screen, for the instance you want to terminate, click Edit Instance then Terminate Instance.
In the confirmation screen that appears, click Terminate Instance.
The instance is terminated and no longer appears in the instance list.
